name: Offset
description:
Welcome to Offset, a game show hosted in purgatory. Being dead can be very boring, so they made a game show where you can win amazing holidays in the garden of eden.

Collect orbs to power platforms and gates to make your way through the challenges. Gates require a certain amount of orbs, white orbs from above and red orbs from below. Get blue orbs to buy goodies from the great Forge. When you succeed you can take a well deserved holiday for 1000 years in the marvelous Garden of Eden.

Movement - WASD
Camera - Mouse
Interact - E
Jump - Space
Flashlight - F
Drop White Orb - 1
Drop Red Ord - 2
Menus Esc
